#summary DataFilter syntax

= Introduction =

Parameters for an data filter field (DataFilter).


= Details =

(todo  0.6 syntax)

*label* a label to display above the search field (may contain HTML/javascript code)

*fields* the database field(s) to use. These can contain references to other tables by including an SQL statement. 

*buttons* the buttons to display at the bottom of the form:
  * reset: reset the form
  * search: perform the search
